refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the EDNS extended RCODE value.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
context
The previously created DNS context that is to be used with this request.
value
The current EDNS extended RCODE value. Valid values range from 0 to 255 inclusive. The default value is 0 (zero). Note that this argument is passed by reference and any existing value will be overwritten.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
This function returns an integer response code. GETDNS_RETURN_GOOD indicates successful completion.
